content: Our reported charge-off amount for Q1 will be lowered by approximately $20 million, or 14% to 16%, as we harmonize our charge-off ratios and policies across the direct lending businesses. And then I just want to make sure, since the 15% to 17% net charge-off rate you're guiding to is actually going to be the results on - I guess on a reported basis, are going to be $20 million below that because of the change in the timing.
